item.title: The Art of Being Productive While Staying In
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: As social distancing and self quarantining continue, here are some effective tips to keep you sane during lockdown and still being productive. Being a remote team, we have put together some of the best life hacks for you to enjoy the solitude during this unprecedented time.

item.title: Wunderlist Alternative: Effortlessly Switch to Quire
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Effortlessly migrate your tasks, to-do lists, folders, projects from Wunderlist to Quire. Change is frustrating, but we made it easy for you! No more looking for the best Wunderlist alternative. Welcome to a task management software that is here to stay!

item.title: Introducing Quire Mobile 5.0 and Everything You Need to Know
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: We can’t be more excited to introduce you with Quire Mobile 5.0 - a brand new chapter for both Quire iOS and Android users! Faster performance, more user-focused interface, all-new tabbed navigation, dynamic search, new feature Sublist, etc., basically everything gets better with the all-new design Quire Mobile 5.0.

item.title: Coronavirus Outbreak: How to Work From Home and Still Stay Productive
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Social distancing is implemented to slow down the spread of Coronavirus. Don't freak out if it's your first work-at-home experience, we will tell you the ultimate guides, from setting up your new office to the way you collaborate with your team from afar.

item.title: Quire joins forces with Google and Zoom to offer free accounts for Nonprofits
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: We understand your struggles, and we would like to share the burden with all of the Nonprofits who have been suffering financially amid the coronavirus pandemic. Quire will offer completely free accounts for Nonprofits during the outbreak, no strings attached.

item.title: The Ultimate Guide to Kanban Swimlanes for Better Project Management
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Kanban board is proven to play a critical role in project management. One of the most important practices of Kanban Board is the Swimlane. This ultimate guide will tell you what Kanban Swimlane is and how to become a Kanban expert.

item.title: Best 5 tips to Use a Digital To Do List for Remote Teams during a Virus Outbreak
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Building a global remote team during the outbreak can take a village, but talented people from across the world can still successfully collaborate as long as leaders can choose the best platform for the team to thrive.

item.title: Top 12 Quire Hacks that Make Your Productivity Great Again
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Team productivity can slow down a bit with all of the cluttered task list, messy organization and awkward communication. In the spirit of sharing, in this post, we will let you know some of the top-notch Quire tips and hacks to make your productivity in 2020 great again!

item.title: Quire Sublist: Bridge the Gap between Team To Do Lists and Personal Productivity
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: At Quire, we never let the stress win and make you feel less of yourself. It's not you, it’s the way your team works with the to do list. Today, in order to solve the frustration and distraction problems once and for all, we introduce you with the ultimate Quire Sublist - the feature that will change the way you deal with your task list forever.
